co.cask.cdap.api.data.stream

Interface StreamWriter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataWriter, WorkerContext

    @Beta
public interface StreamWriter
    Enabling Programs to write to Streams through their Context. This interface is marked as Beta since the API might evolve in future releases until it matures.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StreamBatchWriter createBatchWriter(String stream, String contentType)
      Writes in batch using StreamBatchWriter to a stream
      void write(String stream, ByteBuffer data)
      Writes a ByteBuffer to a stream

      Writes a StreamEventData to a stream

      Writes a string to a stream

      Writes a string to a stream with headers

      Writes a File to a stream in batch

                                  String contentType)

        Parameters:

        contentType - content type
        Returns:
        StreamBatchWriter provides a batch writer
